charges.charge_description: 18:371 CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES did conspire to demand and accept payments intending to be in connection with loans and to submit false loan applications, misapply money and to defraud Anderson Brothers Bank in violation of 18:215, 1014, 656, and 1344 (1)

18:215(a)(2) RECEIPT OF COMMISSION FOR PROCURING LOANS did corruptly solicit, demand, and accept payment with intent to be rewarded in connection with a loan by Anderson Brothers Bank, deposits of which were insured by FDIC (2)
18:1014 LOAN AND CREDIT APPLICATIONS GENERALLY knowingly make false statement on a loan application for the purpose of influencing actions of bank (4)

18:215(a)(2) RECEIPT OF COMMISSION FOR PROCURING LOANS did corruptly solicit, demand and accept payment with intent to be rewarded in connection with a loan being made by Anderson Brothers Bank, deposits of which are insured by FDIC (5)
18:1014 LOAN AND CREDIT APPLICATIONS GENERALLY knowingly make false statement on a loan application submitted to Anderson Brothers Bank for the purpose of influencing the actions of bank (7)

18:215(a)(1) RECEIPT OF COMMISSION FOR PROCURING LOANS did corruptly solicit, demand and accept payment with the intent to be rewarded in connection with a loan from Anderson Brothers Bank, deposits of which are insured by FDIC (8)
18:1014 LOAN AND CREDIT APPLICATIONS GENERALLY knowingly make false statement on a loan application submitted to Anderson Brothers Bank for the purpose of influencing the actions of the bank (9)
18:1014 LOAN AND CREDIT APPLICATIONS GENERALLY knowingly make a false statement on a loan application submitted to Anderson Brothers Bank for the purposes of influencing the actions of the bank (10)
18:1014 LOAN AND CREDIT APPLICATIONS GENERALLY knowingly make false statement on a loan application submitted to Anderson Brothers Bank for the purpose of influencing the actions of the bank (11)

18:371 CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES did conspire to demand and accept payments intending to be in connection with loans and to submit false loan applications, misapply money and to defraud Anderson Brothers Bank in violation of 18:215, 1014, 656, and 1344 (1)
18:1014 LOAN AND CREDIT APPLICATIONS GENERALLY knowingly make a false statement on a loan application submitted to Anderson Brothers Bank for the purposes of influencing the actions of the bank (10)
18:1014 LOAN AND CREDIT APPLICATIONS GENERALLY knowingly make false statement on a loan application submitted to Anderson Brothers Bank for the purpose of influencing the actions of the bank (11)

18:371 CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES did conspire to demand and accept payments intending to be in connection with loans and to submit false loan applications, misapply money and to defraud Anderson Brothers Bank in violation of 18:215, 1014, 656, and 1344 (1)

18:215(a)(1) RECEIPT OF COMMISSION FOR PROCURING LOANS corruptly gave money to an officer of Anderson Brothers Bank with intent to influence and reward in connection with a loan application being submitted and 18:2 AID AND ABET (3)
18:1014 LOAN AND CREDIT APPLICATIONS GENERALLY knowingly make false statement on a loan application for the purpose of influencing actions of bank (4)

18:215(a)(1) RECEIPT OF COMMISSION FOR PROCURING LOANS corruptly gave money to an officer of Anderson Brothers Bank with the intent to influence and reward such person in connection with a loan application being submitted to bank and 18:2 AID AND ABET (6)
18:1014 LOAN AND CREDIT APPLICATIONS GENERALLY knowingly make false statement on a loan application submitted to Anderson Brothers Bank for the purpose of influencing the actions of bank (7)

18:371 CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES did conspire to demand and accept payments intending to be in connection with loans and to submit false loan applications, misapply money and to defraud Anderson Brothers Bank in violation of 18:215, 1014, 656, and 1344 (1)
